item.title: [Project Insanity] void/ torso are wepons not armor need help plz
item.dc:creator: @MasterErik MasterErik
item.description:
@MasterErik wrote:

I had to fix many of those problems,all I did was open up Item.java, put a comma behind the last code,press the TAB button,and type the item code that needs fixing.This is only what I did,yours could be far more different.Mine is a 317 server.

item.title: [Project Insanity] void/ torso are wepons not armor need help plz
item.dc:creator: @99matt99 99matt99
item.description:
@99matt99 wrote:

im not sure witch one yours will be under because my pi is set up differently but it shud be in the item assistant folder. Search for

		if(Item.playerCape(item)) {
			return "cape";

something like that and then there should be some items listed under the others add on the array sort thingy =p

item.title: [Project Insanity] void/ torso are wepons not armor need help plz
item.dc:creator: @taintedhappy taintedhappy
item.description:
@taintedhappy wrote:

its weird i looked in almost all of the files i looked up the codes can someone help me make void/torso armor not wepons plz =)
this is what i get for void

public boolean fullVoidRange() { return playerEquipment[playerHat] == 11664 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 8840 && playerEquipment[playerChest] == 8839 && playerEquipment[playerHands] == 8842; } 
public boolean fullVoidMage() {
	return playerEquipment[playerHat] == 11663 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 8840 && playerEquipment[playerChest] == 8839 && playerEquipment[playerHands] == 8842;
}

public boolean fullVoidMelee() {
	return playerEquipment[playerHat] == 11665 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 8840 && playerEquipment[playerChest] == 8839 && playerEquipment[playerHands] == 8842;
}</blockquote>
